mapper.insert: insert into bandMember(bandNo, memberId, memberNickname, isApproved, greeting) values(#{bandNo}, #{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{isApproved}, #{greeting});
mapper.select: select bandMember.isApproved from bandMember where bandNo=#{bandNo} and memberId=#{id}
select * from bandMember where bandNo=#{bandNo} order by idx asc
select count(*) from bandMember join band on bandMember.bandNo = band.no where bandMember.isApproved=false and band.masterId=#{id}

select bandMember.bandNo, bandMember.memberId, bandMember.memberNickname, bandMember.isApproved, bandMember.greeting, bandMember.requestAt, band.name as bandName from bandMember join band on bandMember.bandNo = band.no where bandMember.isApproved=false and band.masterId='master' order by requestAt desc;
mapper.update: update bandMember set isApproved=true where bandNo=#{bandNo} and memberId=#{id} and isApproved=false;
mapper.delete: delete from bandMember where memberId=#{id} and bandNo=#{bandNo}
